module.name: Admin Edit Table
module.author: Alain Bertrand
module.description: Allows you to access specific tables (through config.xml) for browsing as well as editing. For security reasons only allowed tables can be access through this modules.

key.name: useTableEditorWizards
key.description: If set to true (the default) the table editor module will use the wizards for the logic and the actions. If set to false, a text area is instead used.
